dct_title_s: An actual survey of the provinces of Bengal, Bahar, &c (Sheet 1)
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:750,000. Relief shown pictorially. Covers area from Benares to Chittigong, from"Botan" [Bhutan] to Bay of Bengal."Published by permission of the court of directors from a drawing in their possession by A. Dury." Includes 1776 dedication by Andrew Dury.
dcat_keyword_sm: West Bengal (India) Maps Early Works to 1800
